caption: Splitter - Fetch Token Balance
doc: Fetch the ERC-20 token balance of a splitter.

AJS.caption: Wallet Address
AJS.doc: This action fetches the ERC-20 token balance this wallet address is owed from the splitter.
AJS.name: wallet_address

AJT.caption: Split Contract Address
AJT.doc: The smart contract address of the Splitter being distributed. Please note: The user calling this function must be once the recipients of the splitter.
AJT.name: split_contract_address

AJU.caption: Token Contract Address
AJU.doc: The smart contract address of the ERC-20 token the balance is being fetched for.
AJU.name: token_contract_address

AJZ.caption: RPC URL
AJZ.doc: Provide a RPC url for the network is the splitter you are fetching information from is deployed on. Mainnet example: https://main-light.eth.linkpool.io
AJZ.name: default_provider
